attributes.action: make the long term unemployed  pay back the common taxpayer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if a person is long term unemployed of which there are a so called a number of, then there should be a system in place where they have to work 3 days a week at a minimum wage with the tax payer only having to pay the difference between the minimum wage and the government benefits, allowing 2 days to activeley seek full time employment. jobs such as trolley pushers, vegetable sorters
